description:
It's been quite a while since the hunky and young Ricky M showed off his assets on TommyD's site. Well, the wait is over and what a scene we have here.

The two partied this last weekend, and when we burst into Tommy's room to wake him up, we noticed Ricky M was in bed with him. After explaining to us that he and Ricky hooked up the previous night, the two start to get it on again. Luckily, we had the cameras read to capture any kinky fun that transpired.

The two stroke and suck each other in many positions including the wonderful 69. Ricky M gets off first, followed by Tommy. We hope we can convince Ricky M to explore his sexuality even more.

Enjoy!
title: The Explorator
